author: beforeitsnews.com
title: In Germany, Refugees Brawl--Over Religion | Opinion - Conservative
text:
(Before It's News)
Hat tip Vlad Tepes
In a refugee camp in Kassel, Germany, police are called to break up brawls between refugees. The main cause? Religious differences. This results, naturally, in police being injured. Vlad Tepes has a German news report with English sub-titles. Also note the high proportion of young males among the refugees.
http://vladtepesblog.com/2015/09/29/14-police-injured-in-brawl-of-refugees-in-germany/
